data.text:
Faculty and Staff Appreciation Week 2023

We are pleased to announce this yearâs dates and theme for Employee Appreciation Week. Mark your calendars for the week of September 18 for employee appreciation focusing on âWell-Being and Well Connected Across UConn.â Several events and activities - from in-person to virtual - will provide a space to appreciate employees and encourage appreciation for one another. We invite you to join one or many of the events and/or activities planned to "celebrate you!"

Learn more...

Recognizing Years of Service to the University

For the 2024 Employee Recognition Program, we are recognizing employees who reached milestone years in 2024. The University identifies eligible employees when they reach a milestone year by February 1st of the employee recognition program year.

Employees reaching 5 years of service will receive a certificate. In addition to a certificate, employees who have reached 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45, and 50+ years of service will receive an email link from our promotionâs vendor, JMA, to a site with a selection of awards memorializing their achievement. Certificates and awards will be made available this Fall.

For questions, please contact worklife@uconn.edu.
